name: Ninja 314
storyline:
Don't get fooled by the simple appearance of the main character, this game provides a real challenge. With simple but differentiated mechanics, the game tests the skill of the one who wants to follow the hard path of a ninja.
Ninja 314 is a vertical platform game that requires ability and strategy to overcome obstacles and enemies. Grab the the walls, jump with precision and kill the enemies using special items, in order to reach the top of each stage.
